text:

Basports.com also is the only documented handicapper to ever win over 70% in both college & NFL football in the same year and is now ranked #1 in two national football handicapping contests
WAUCHULA, Fla. , Sept. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bob Akmens Sports ( Basports.com ) is off to a perfect 5-0, 100% start this NFL season in two national handicapping contests. Both The Sports Monitor and The Sports Eye have Basports.com solidly on top with a perfect 100% winning record. The gold standard of sports service monitors is Ruth Glasgow's The Sports Monitor , which has tracked handicapper performance since the 1980s. Of the many thousands of sports services, only about 150 will risk exposing their records publicly in contests such as those The Sports Monitor runs. Many of the rest, claiming 80-90% wins, are outright scams.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270712LOGO
It's no surprise Bob Akmens is the best football handicapper again. Basports.com had the finest football handicapping season ever documented in 28 years by The Sports Monitor (TSM). In college football, they won the TSM contest in multiple categories with 73.47% , more than 9% better than the second-place service. This more than doubles the largest victory margin ever in any football contest at TSM. In the NFL, they won 70.83% and were #1 in the most net-profit won category.
Basports.com became the very first sports service to ever win over 70% in both college football & the NFL in the same season in any national contest. No one else has ever come close to duplicating this monumental feat.
The ultimate football handicapping contest for a sports service is The Sports Monitor's Combination Football Contest. Bob Akmens Sports won that contest, finishing #1 in every category, and winning 72.16%.
The second-place service (out of 125) had 63%. The other 123 services had 59% or less. Basports.com's 9%+ margin of victory in the single most important football handicapping contest for sports services destroyed every record in the books. The biggest win in this top contest had ever been 4%. Basports.com more than doubled that with 9% better than anyone else.
Records in individual categories of these contests such as most net-wins, win-percentage, most net-profit, return-on-risk, etc. were also established with documented records such as 24-4 in college football totals .
Basports.com has proven themselves to truly be the world's best sports handicappers. But none of this is new to Akmens. About.com (owned by The New York Times ) has called Bob Akmens " one of the most respected handicappers in the business, " and pays him the ultimate compliment that " no other handicapper can match Akmens in terms of winning. " It is impossible to get a stronger review than that. Akmens may have the best review ever written by a major website about a sports service.
About.com's sports betting expert has also said, " I can count on one hand the number of services that I would give a positive recommendation about to a fellow sports bettor. Bob Akmens Sports would certainly be included in that select group. " With 327 #1-finishes in different categories (win %, most net wins, etc.) of documented handicapping contests, Bob Akmens Sports has positively proven to be the most profitable sports handicapper out there, making millions in profits for thousands of clients.
Every search engine, from Google to Bing to even China's giant search engine Baidu, comes up with Bob Akmens Sports as the very top hit when you search for "who is the world's best sports handicapper?" That's true for one reason: they truly win more than anyone else.
No wonder About.com said about Bob Akmens Sports , " you get what you pay for…plus more. " #1 handicapper in win-percentage. #1 handicapper in most net-wins. #1 handicapper in most net-profit. #1 handicapper in return-on-risk. #1 handicapper in the past…and #1 handicapper in the present. Hard-working. Profit-producing. Basports.com expects to have a very profitable football season, indeed.
